## ZUSD\_LIQUIDATION\_RESERVE variable

Amount of ZUSD that's reserved for compensating the liquidator of a Trove.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
ZUSD_LIQUIDATION_RESERVE: Decimal
```
